name: Tuna and Broccoli Noodle Casserole
author: sal
summary: The vegetables in this dish give it some extra zip and is excellent for a family. Add a green salad for a filling meal, if desired.
ingredients: 3 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of slightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente
Add carrots and broccoli for 5 minutes or less before removing pasta; drain
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine pasta, carrots, broccoli, soup, tuna, celery, onion, and red bell pepper; mix all together
Place mixture evenly in a 9x13 inch baking dish, and sprinkle cheese on top
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes
